title: Narrative-Based English Learning: Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced English grammar and vocabulary proficiency
context.additional_context: A course focused on developing students' real-life problem-solving skills through storytelling and maintaining language learning motivation. Includes interactive activities using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can enhance English fluency by 20% through reconstructing a 3+ minute English story after narrative-based instruction.
Learners demonstrate over 80% emotional immersion during storytelling activities and engage in linguistic responses (questions, discussions) at least five times.
Learners perceive the sustained concentration effect of narrative-based instruction at 4.0/5.0 or higher in post-class evaluation surveys.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
